abstract: Real Salt Lake owner Dell Loy Hansen is slapped with $150,000 fine for discussing free agency while Major League Soccer and players' union are engaged in contract talks; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Real Salt Lake owner Dell Loy Hansen was fined $150,000 for comments about free agency. The fine is the largest in Major League Soccer history.

headline.main: Real Salt Lake’s Owner Is Fined

snippet: The Real Salt Lake owner Dell Loy Hansen was fined $150,000 for comments about free agency. The fine is the largest in Major League Soccer history.
